name: Exodus Eskpe
description:
We are a group of students from the University of Alicante who have developed a video game in assembler z80. It was our first approach to the world of retro video game development. 

Authors
  • Carlos Villena. Main developer, gameplay programmer,  level designer and tester.
  • Xavier Bonilla. Graphic designer, programmer.
  • Antonio Muñoz. Music/SFX, gameplay programmer.
Licenses

In the development of the game we have used the following software:

Visual Studio Code -> Source code editor

Arkos tracker 1 -> Music and sfx

CPCTelera -> An integrated development framework for creating Amstrad CPC games

Tiled -> 2D level editor

Photoshop -> Image editor used for retouching photos and graphics
